mapper.update:
UPDATE cb_outlet
client_id = #{clientId},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
outlet_id = #{outletId},
area_id = #{areaId},
order_value = #{orderValue},
outlet_name = #{outletName},
outlet_fullname = #{outletFullname},
outlet_status = #{outletStatus},
address = #{address},
business_hours = #{businessHours},
zip = #{zip},
fax = #{fax},
phone = #{phone},
contact_name = #{contactName},
contact_phone = #{contactPhone},
contact_email = #{contactEmail},
service_provider = #{serviceProvider},
longitude = #{longitude},
latitude = #{latitude},
is_enable = #{isEnable},
disable_status = #{disableStatus},
description = #{description},
prefer_details = #{preferDetails},
prefer_start_period = #{preferStartPeriod},
prefer_end_period = #{preferEndPeriod},
discount = #{discount},
discount_code = #{discountCode},
discount_rate = #{discountRate},
audit_time = #{auditTime},
audit_comment = #{auditComment},
audit_staff = #{auditStaff},
audit_state = #{auditState},
edit_audit_state = #{editAuditState},
is_default = #{isDefault},
prefer_status = #{preferStatus},
qrcode_url = #{qrcodeUrl},
AND id = #{id}
AND outlet_id = #{outletId}
AND merchant_id = #{merchantId}
UPDATE cb_outlet SET is_enable = false , disable_status = 1 where outlet_id = #{outletId}
mapper.select:
SELECT cl.outlet_id, cl.outlet_name FROM cb_outlet cl LEFT JOIN cb_org co ON cl.outlet_id = co.outlet_id
AND (co.province_agency = #{orgCode} OR co.city_agency = #{orgCode} OR co.county_agency = #{orgCode}) AND co.org_code <> #{orgCode} AND cl.client_id = #{clientId} AND cl.outlet_status = true AND cl.is_enable = true
LIMIT 1000

SELECT id,create_time,client_id,merchant_id,outlet_id,area_id,order_value,outlet_name,outlet_fullname,outlet_status,address,business_hours,zip,fax,phone,contact_name,contact_phone,contact_email,service_provider,longitude,latitude,is_enable,disable_status,description,prefer_details,prefer_start_period,prefer_end_period,discount,audit_time,audit_comment,audit_staff,audit_state,edit_audit_state,is_default,prefer_status,qrcode_url FROM cb_outlet
is_enable = true AND outlet_status = true
AND merchant_id IN
#{item}
